question: How many hospitals are there in Oxford?
sparql: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) AS ?total) WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_hospital_103540595 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Oxford geo:hasGeometry ?og . ?og geo:asWKT ?oWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?oWKT, ?xWKT) }

question: How many underground lines does London have?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) AS ?total) WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wikicat_London_Underground_lines }

question: How many counties does England have?
sparql: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) AS ?totalCounty) WHERE { ?x ?p yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) }

question: Which restaurants are close to London Bridge?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?poi WHERE { ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom ; osm:has_name "London Bridge" ; rdf:type osm:Attraction . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT . ?poi rdf:type osm:Restaurant ; geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) }

question: Is there any hospital in a range of 1 km from Jubilee Gardens in London?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom ; osm:has_name "Jubilee Gardens" ; rdf:type osm:Park . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT . ?poi rdf:type osm:Hospital ; geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) }

question: Which counties border county Lincolnshire?
sparql: SELECT ?county WHERE { ?lincolnshire rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County ; y2geoo:hasOS_Name "Lincolnshire County" ; geo:hasGeometry ?geomLC . ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?lcWKT . ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County ; geo:hasGeometry ?geomC . ?geomC geo:asWKT ?cWKT FILTER geof:sfTouches(?lcWKT, ?cWKT) }

question: Where is Loch Goil located?
sparql: SELECT ?x1WKT WHERE { yago:Loch_Goil geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo . ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT }

question: Which bridges cross river Thames?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?bridges WHERE { ?bridges rdf:type yago:wordnet_bridge_102898711 ; <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/crosses> ?o FILTER contains(str(?o), "Thames") }

question: What is the number of universities in London?
sparql: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) AS ?total) WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_university_108286569 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:London geo:hasGeometry ?londonGeo . ?londonGeo geo:asWKT ?londonWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?londonWKT, ?xWKT) }

question: Which rivers are in Wales?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?river WHERE { ?river rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?rg . ?rg geo:asWKT ?rWKT . yago:Wales geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?rWKT, ?xWKT) }

question: Which counties of Scotland border England?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?county WHERE { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County ; geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom . ?cGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?iWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?geom1 . ?geom1 geo:asWKT ?iWKT1 FILTER ( geof:sfWithin(?cWKT, ?iWKT) && geof:sfTouches(?cWKT, ?iWKT1) ) }

question: Where is Nelson's Column located?
sparql: SELECT ?geomWKT WHERE { ?entity osm:has_name "Nelson's Column" ; geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?geomWKT }

question: Does the county of Durham border Essex?
sparql: ASK WHERE { yago:Essex geo:sfTouches yago:County_Durham }

question: Which restaurants are at most 1km away from Big Ben?
sparql: SELECT ?restaurant WHERE { ?bigBen osm:has_name "Big Ben" ; geo:hasGeometry ?bigBenGeom . ?bigBenGeom geo:asWKT ?bigBenGeomWKT . ?restaurant rdf:type osm:Restaurant ; osm:has_name ?restaurantName ; geo:hasGeometry ?restaurantGeom . ?restaurantGeom geo:asWKT ?restaurantGeomWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?restaurantGeomWKT, ?bigBenGeomWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) }

question: Is county Oxfordshire east of the county Essex?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?oxfordshire rdfs:label ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?geo1 FILTER ( str(?l) = "Oxfordshire" ) ?geo1 geo:asWKT ?wkt1 . ?essex rdfs:label ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?geo2 . ?geo2 geo:asWKT ?wkt2 FILTER ( str(?l2) = "Essex" ) FILTER strdf:left(?wkt1, ?wkt2) }

question: Which pubs in Dublin are near Guinness Brewery?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?pub WHERE { ?pub rdf:type osm:Pub ; geo:hasGeometry ?pubGeo . ?pubGeo geo:asWKT ?pubWKT . ?dublin osm:has_name ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?dublinGeo . ?dublinGeo geo:asWKT ?dublinWKT . ?guiness osm:has_name ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?guinessGeo . ?guinessGeo geo:asWKT ?guinessWKT FILTER ( str(?l2) = "Dublin" ) FILTER ( str(?l) = "Guinness Brewery" ) FILTER ( geof:distance(?guinessWKT, ?pubWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) FILTER geof:sfContains(?dublinWKT, ?pubWKT) }

question: Which hospitals in Liverpool are near Abercromby Square?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?hospital WHERE { ?hospital rdf:type osm:Hospital ; geo:hasGeometry ?hospitalGeo . ?hospitalGeo geo:asWKT ?hospitalWKT . ?Liverpool rdfs:label ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LiverpoolGeo . ?LiverpoolGeo geo:asWKT ?LiverpoolWKT . ?Abercromby osm:has_name ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?AbercrombyGeo . ?AbercrombyGeo geo:asWKT ?AbercrombyWKT FILTER ( str(?l2) = "Liverpool" ) FILTER ( str(?l) = "Abercromby Square" ) FILTER geof:sfContains(?LiverpoolWKT, ?hospitalWKT) FILTER ( geof:distance(?hospitalWKT, ?AbercrombyWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) }

question: Which cafes in London are at most 3 km from St. Anthony the Great and St. John the Baptist church?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?cafe WHERE { ?cafe rdf:type osm:Cafe ; geo:hasGeometry ?cafeGeo . ?cafeGeo geo:asWKT ?cafeWKT . ?London rdfs:label ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LondonGeo . ?LondonGeo geo:asWKT ?LondonWKT . ?church osm:has_name ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?churchGeo . ?churchGeo geo:asWKT ?churchWKT FILTER ( str(?l2) = "London" ) FILTER ( str(?l) = "St. Anthony the Great & St. John the Baptist" ) FILTER geof:sfContains(?LondonWKT, ?cafeWKT) FILTER ( geof:distance(?cafeWKT, ?churchWKT, uom:metre) < 3000 ) }

question: Which department stores are at most 2km from Central Park hotel in London?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?city WHERE { ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom ; osm:has_name "London" ; rdf:type osm:City . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT . ?poi geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom ; osm:has_name "Central Park Hotel" ; rdf:type osm:Hotel . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT . ?dept rdf:type osm:Department_Store ; geo:hasGeometry ?dGeom . ?dGeom geo:asWKT ?dWKT FILTER ( geof:sfContains(?cWKT, ?poiWKT) && ( geof:distance(?dWKT, ?cWKT, uom:metre) <= 2000 ) ) }

question: Which universities are in county Essex?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?university WHERE { ?university rdf:type yago:wordnet_university_108286569 ; geo:hasGeometry ?Ug . ?Ug geo:asWKT ?UWKT . yago:Essex geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?xWKT, ?UWKT) }

question: Is there a church at most 2km from the University of Westminster?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?s2 <http://data.linkedeodata.eu/ontology#has_name> "University of Westminster" ; rdf:type osm:University ; geo:hasGeometry ?geo2 . ?geo2 geo:asWKT ?w2 . ?s3 geo:hasGeometry ?geo3 ; <http://data.linkedeodata.eu/ontology#has_name> ?name . ?geo3 geo:asWKT ?w3 . ?s3 rdf:type osm:Church FILTER ( geof:distance(?w3, ?w2, uom:metre) < 2000 ) }

question: Is there a mountain in the county of Greater Manchester taller than 1300 meters above sea level?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_mountain_109359803 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Greater_Manchester geo:hasGeometry ?gmGeo . ?gmGeo geo:asWKT ?gmWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?gmWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/elevationm> ?property FILTER ( xsd:integer(str(?property)) > 1300 ) }

question: Which mountains in Scotland have height more than 1000 meters?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_mountain_109359803 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xg . ?xg geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?gmGeo . ?gmGeo geo:asWKT ?sWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?xWKT, ?sWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/elevationm> ?property FILTER ( xsd:integer(str(?property)) > 1000 ) }

question: What's the name of the river that runs through London?

question: Which counties of England border country Scotland?

question: Which restaurants are near Baker Street in London?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?p2 WHERE { ?l owl:sameAs yago:London ; geo:hasGeometry ?lGeom . ?lGeom geo:asWKT ?lWKT . ?p1 osm:has_name "Baker Street" ; geo:hasGeometry ?p1geo . ?p1geo geo:asWKT ?p1aswkt . ?p2 rdf:type osm:Restaurant ; geo:hasGeometry ?p2geo . ?p2geo geo:asWKT ?p2aswkt FILTER ( geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt, ?lWKT) && ( geof:distance(?p1aswkt, ?p2aswkt, uom:metre) < 500 ) ) }

question: Which countries border Wales?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?country WHERE { ?country rdf:type yago:wordnet_country_108544813 . yago:Wales yago:hasNeighbor ?country }

question: Is England part of the United Kingdom?
sparql: ASK WHERE { yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo . ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT . yago:United_Kingdom geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo . ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WK FILTER geof:sfWithin(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT) }

question: How many county councils are there in Ireland?
sparql: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?county) AS ?total) WHERE { yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?irelandGeom . ?irelandGeom geo:asWKT ?irelandGeomWKT . ?county osm:hasName ?countyName ; geo:hasGeometry ?countyGeom . ?countyGeom geo:asWKT ?countyGeomWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?countyGeomWKT, ?irelandGeomWKT) }

question: Which restaurants are near Stonehenge?
sparql: SELECT ?x1 WHERE { ?x1 rdf:type osm:Restaurant ; geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo . ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT . ?x2 osm:has_name "Stonehenge" ; geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo . ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) }

question: What tourist attractions are there in Belfast, Northern Ireland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?p2 WHERE { yago:Northern_Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?p0geo . ?p0geo geo:asWKT ?p0aswkt . ?bl owl:sameAs yago:Belfast ; geo:hasGeometry ?p1geo . ?p1geo geo:asWKT ?p1aswkt . ?p2 rdf:type osm:Attraction ; geo:hasGeometry ?p2geo . ?p2geo geo:asWKT ?p2aswkt FILTER ( geof:sfWithin(?p2aswkt, ?p1aswkt) && geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt, ?p0aswkt) ) }

question: Which are the districts of county Chesire?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?districts WHERE { ?districts ?p yago:wikicat_Districts_of_Cheshire }

question: Where is Tower Bridge located?
sparql: SELECT ?xWKT WHERE { yago:Tower_Bridge geo:hasGeometry ?xgeo . ?xgeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT }

question: Is London south of Manchester?
sparql: ASK WHERE { yago:geoentity_City_of_London_2643744 geo:hasGeometry ?xGeom . ?xGeom geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Manchester geo:hasGeometry ?mGeom . ?mGeom geo:asWKT ?mWKT FILTER strdf:below(?xWKT, ?mWKT) }

question: Are there any lakes in Scotland?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_lake_109328904 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?sGeo . ?sGeo geo:asWKT ?sWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?xWKT, ?sWKT) }

question: Which counties border county Donegal to the south?
sparql: SELECT ?x1 WHERE { ?x1 rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County ; geo:hasGeometry ?x1geo . ?x1geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT . <https://yago-knowledge.org/resource/County_Donegal> geo:hasGeometry ?x2geo . ?x2geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT FILTER strdf:below(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT) FILTER geof:sfTouches(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT) }

question: Is there a forest near Manchester?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?forest rdf:type <http://www.app-lab.eu/osm/ontology#forest> ; geo:hasGeometry ?forestGeom . ?forestGeom geo:asWKT ?forestWKT . ?Manchester owl:sameAs yago:Manchester ; geo:hasGeometry ?ManchesterGeom . ?Manchestereom geo:asWKT ?ManchesterWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?forestWKT, ?ManchesterWKT, uom:metre) < 5000 ) }

question: Is the Tower of London near river Thames?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?x1 osm:has_name "Tower of London" ; geo:hasGeometry ?x1geo . ?x1geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT . ?x2 osm:has_name "Thames" ; geo:hasGeometry ?x2geo . ?x2geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT, uom:metre) < 50000 ) }

question: Does Hammersmith Bridge connect Hammersmith with Barnes?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Bridge ; osm:has_name "Hammersmith Bridge" ; geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?ham owl:sameAS yago:Hammersmith ; geo:hasGeometry ?hamGeom . ?hamGeom geo:asWKT ?hamWKT . ?bar owl:sameAS <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Barnes,_London> ; geo:hasGeometry ?barGeom . ?barGeom geo:asWKT ?barWKT FILTER geof:sfTouches(?hamWKT, ?wkt) FILTER geof:sfTouches(?barWKT, ?wkt) }

question: Which rivers discharge into the Solway Firth?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?river WHERE { ?river rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; ?p yago:Solway_Firth }

question: Which art museums are at most 1km from Charlotte Square in Edinburgh?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?poi WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Museum ; geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?instance osm:has_name "Charlotte Square" ; geo:hasGeometry ?inGeom . ?inGeom geo:asWKT ?inWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?wkt, ?inWKT, uom:metre) <= 1000 ) }

question: Which rivers cross county Cheshire?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?river WHERE { ?river rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?riverGeo . ?riverGeo geo:asWKT ?rWKT . yago:Cheshire geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?xWKT, ?rWKT) }

question: Where can I find a car park in Exeter?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?poi WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Parking ; geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT . ?city owl:sameAs yago:Exeter ; geo:hasGeometry ?cityGeom . ?cityGeom geo:asWKT ?cityWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?poiWKT, ?cityWKT) }

question: Which is the highest mountain in Ireland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_mountain_109359803 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?irGeo . ?irGeo geo:asWKT ?irWKT . ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/elevationm> ?property FILTER geof:sfContains(?irWKT, ?xWKT) } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Where is the closest market to Elephant and Castle underground station?
sparql: SELECT ?poiWKT ?poi (geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) AS ?res) WHERE { SERVICE <http://pyravlos2.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query> { ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom ; osm:has_name "Elephant and Castle" ; rdf:type osm:Railway_Station . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT . ?poi rdf:type osm:Supermarket ; geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) < 1000 ) } } ORDER BY geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of Britain's longest river?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?name WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasLength ?property ; rdfs:label ?name } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(str(?property))) LIMIT 1

question: Which cities in England have at least 2 castles?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) ?y rdf:type yago:wordnet_palace_103878066 ; geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?xWKT, ?yWKT) } GROUP BY ?x HAVING ( COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) > 1 )

question: Which is the biggest county council in the Republic of Ireland?
sparql: SELECT ?countyName WHERE { yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?irelandGeom . ?irelandGeom geo:asWKT ?irelandGeomWKT . ?county osm:hasName ?countyName ; geo:hasGeometry ?countyGeom . ?countyGeom geo:asWKT ?countyGeomWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?countyGeomWKT, ?irelandGeomWKT) } ORDER BY ASC(strdf:area(?countyGeomWKT)) LIMIT 1

question: Which football stadium has the biggest capacity in Ireland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wikicat_Association_football_venues_in_the_Republic_of_Ireland ; <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/seatingcapacity> ?o } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?o)) LIMIT 1

question: Which site of Manchester is the most popular?
sparql: SELECT ?site ?sitename ?visitors WHERE { SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query> { ?manchester owl:sameAs yago:Manchester ; geo:hasGeometry _:b0 . _:b0 geo:asWKT ?manchesterWKT { { ?site rdf:type osm:Attraction } UNION { ?site rdf:type osm:Museum } } ?site owl:sameAs ?link ; osm:has_name ?sitename ; geo:hasGeometry _:b1 . _:b1 geo:asWKT ?siteWKT FILTER geof:sfWithin(?siteWKT, ?manchesterWKT) } SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8890/sparql> { ?link <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/visitors> ?visitors } } ORDER BY DESC(?visitors) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the oldest bridge of London?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_bridge_102898711 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:London geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:wasCreatedOnDate ?property } ORDER BY ?property LIMIT 1

question: Where is the nearest gas station to St. Peter's Square in Manchester?
sparql: SELECT ?p3 WHERE { ?p1 osm:has_name "St. Peter's Square" ; geo:hasGeometry ?p1geo . ?p1geo geo:asWKT ?p1aswkt . yago:Manchester geo:hasGeometry ?p2geo . ?p2geo geo:asWKT ?p2aswkt . ?p3 rdf:type osm:Fuel ; osm:has_name ?p3name ; geo:hasGeometry ?p3geo . ?p3geo geo:asWKT ?p3aswkt FILTER geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt, ?p2aswkt) BIND(geof:distance(?p1aswkt, ?p3aswkt, uom:metre) AS ?distance) } ORDER BY ?distance LIMIT 1

question: Which city in Scotland has the largest population?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/populationtotal> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which cities of the United Kingdom have a university?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:United_Kingdom geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?z rdf:type yago:wordnet_university_108286569 ; geo:hasGeometry ?zGeo . ?zGeo geo:asWKT ?zWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?xWKT, ?zWKT) }

question: What is the elevation of the most elevated spot in county Down?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_mountain_109359803 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:County_Down geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/elevationm> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the largest county of England?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/areatotalkm> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?property)) LIMIT 1

question: What is the longest river in England and Wales?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasLength ?property } UNION { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Wales geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasLength ?property } } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?property)) LIMIT 1

question: Which city in Scotland has the largest population?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?sGeo . ?sGeo geo:asWKT ?sWKT . ?x yago:hasNumberOfPeople ?property FILTER geof:sfContains(?sWKT, ?xWKT) } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which city of England is nearest to London?
sparql: SELECT ?city (geof:distance(?LondonWKT, ?cityWKT, uom:metre) AS ?distance) WHERE { ?city rdf:type osm:City ; geo:hasGeometry ?cityGeo . ?cityGeo geo:asWKT ?cityWKT . ?London rdf:type osm:City ; osm:has_name ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LondonGeo . ?LondonGeo geo:asWKT ?LondonWKT FILTER ( str(?l2) = "London" ) FILTER ( ?city != ?London ) } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

question: Is there a river in Ireland that crosses more than 3 cities?
sparql: ASK WHERE { { SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 . ?y rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 . ?x geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . ?y geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT . yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?iGeo . ?iGeo geo:asWKT ?iWKT FILTER ( geof:sfContains(?iWKT, ?xWKT) && geof:sfCrosses(?xWKT, ?yWKT) ) } GROUP BY ?x HAVING ( COUNT(?y) > 3 ) } }

question: Which is the largest royal borough of London?
sparql: SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type y2geoo:OS_LondonBoroughWard ; geo:hasGeometry ?Geom . ?Geom geo:asWKT ?GeomWKT } ORDER BY ASC(strdf:area(?GeomWKT)) LIMIT 1

question: Which river crosses the most cities in England?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 . ?y rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT . ?x geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT FILTER ( geof:sfCrosses(?xWKT, ?yWKT) && geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?yWKT) ) } GROUP BY ?x ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(DISTINCT ?y)) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the largest lake by area in England?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_lake_109328904 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/area> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Does Everton FC plays in Liverpool?
sparql: ASK WHERE { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Everton_F.C.> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/ground> ?o FILTER contains(?o, "Liverpool") }

question: Which is the largest city of Ireland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?iGeo . ?iGeo geo:asWKT ?iWKT . ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/areatotalkm> ?property FILTER geof:sfContains(?iWKT, ?xWKT) } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which car park is closest to a bridge on river Exe?
sparql: SELECT ?poi WHERE { SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8890/sparql> { yago:River_Exe ?p ?o . ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_bridge_102898711 ; rdf:label ?label } SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query> { ?poi rdf:type osm:Parking ; geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?b osm:has_name ?label ; geo:hasGeometry ?bGeom . ?bGeom geo:asWKT ?bWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?wkt, ?bWKT, uom:metre) < 500 ) } } ORDER BY DESC(( geof:distance(?wkt, ?bWKT, uom:metre) < 500 )) LIMIT 1

question: What is the most densely populated city in Ireland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?iGeo . ?iGeo geo:asWKT ?iWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?iWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasPopulationDensity ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Is Glasgow the largest city of Scotland in terms of population?
sparql: SELECT ( ?property1 > ?property ) WHERE { yago:Glasgow yago:hasNumberOfPeople ?property1 . ?y rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?xWKT, ?yWKT) ?y yago:hasNumberOfPeople ?property }

question: Does England have more counties than Ireland?
sparql: SELECT ( COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) > COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) ) WHERE { { SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) } } { SELECT ?y WHERE { ?y rdf:type yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT . yago:Ireland geo:hasGeometry ?iGeo . ?iGeo geo:asWKT ?iWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?iWKT, ?yWKT) } } }

question: Which is the largest lake in England?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_lake_109328904 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?EGeo . ?EGeo geo:asWKT ?EWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?EWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/area> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Are the cities that River Thames crosses more than 10?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_city_108524735 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:River_Thames geo:hasGeometry ?rGeo . ?rGeo geo:asWKT ?rWKT FILTER geof:sfCrosses(?rWKT, ?xWKT) } HAVING ( ?total > 10 )

question: Are there any rivers that cross both England and Wales?
sparql: ASK WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfCrosses(?xWKT, ?yWKT) yago:Wales geo:hasGeometry ?zGeo . ?zGeo geo:asWKT ?zWKT FILTER geof:sfCrosses(?xWKT, ?zWKT) }

question: Which county of England occupies the largest area?
sparql: SELECT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/areatotalkm> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: What is the longest bridge in Scotland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_bridge_102898711 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/length> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which hospital is nearest to Calton Hill in Edinburgh?
sparql: SELECT ?hospital (geof:distance(?hospitalWKT, ?CaltonWKT, uom:metre) AS ?distance) WHERE { ?hospital rdf:type osm:Hospital ; geo:hasGeometry ?hospitalGeo . ?hospitalGeo geo:asWKT ?hospitalWKT . yago:Edinburgh geo:hasGeometry ?EdinburghGeo . ?EdinburghGeo geo:asWKT ?EdinburghWKT . ?Calton osm:has_name ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?CaltonGeo . ?CaltonGeo geo:asWKT ?CaltonWKT FILTER ( str(?l) = "Calton Hill" ) FILTER geof:sfContains(?EdinburghWKT, ?hospitalWKT) } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the closest airport to London?
sparql: SELECT ?poi WHERE { SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query> { yago:London geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT . ?poi rdf:type osm:Airport ; geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom . ?poiGeom geo:asWKT ?poiWKT } BIND(geof:distance(?instanceWKT, ?poiWKT, uom:metre) AS ?res) } ORDER BY ?res LIMIT 1

question: Which is the highest point in Cheshire?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_mountain_109359803 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Cheshire geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/elevationm> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the highest building in London?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_building_102913152 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:London geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasHeight ?property } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?property)) LIMIT 1

question: Is the county of Antrim bigger than the county of Armagh?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ( ?a1 > ?a2 ) WHERE { yago:County_Antrim yago:hasArea ?a1 . yago:County_Armagh yago:hasArea ?a2 }

question: Which is the smallest lake in Scotland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_lake_109328904 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x yago:hasArea ?property } ORDER BY xsd:double(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which hotel is the nearest to Old Trafford Stadium in Manchester?
sparql: SELECT ?hotel (geof:distance(?hotelWKT, ?TraffordWKT, uom:metre) AS ?distance) WHERE { ?hotel rdf:type osm:Hotel ; geo:hasGeometry ?hoteleo . ?hotelGeo geo:asWKT ?hotelWKT . yago:Manchester geo:hasGeometry ?ManchesterGeo . ?ManchesterGeo geo:asWKT ?ManchesterWKT . ?Trafford osm:has_name ?l ; geo:hasGeometry ?TraffordGeo ; rdf:type osm:Stadium . ?TraffordGeo geo:asWKT ?TraffordWKT FILTER ( str(?l) = "Old Trafford" ) FILTER geof:sfContains(?ManchesterWKT, ?hotelWKT) } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

question: Which county of England has the biggest population?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_county_108546183 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/population> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which Welsh district has the most adjacent Welsh districts?
sparql: SELECT ?district1name (COUNT(?district2) AS ?count) WHERE { SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query> { ?district1 rdf:type y2geoo:OS_UnitaryAuthority ; osm:hasName ?district1name ; geo:hasGeometry _:b0 . _:b0 geo:asWKT ?district1WKT . ?district2 rdf:type y2geoo:OS_UnitaryAuthority ; osm:hasName ?district2name ; geo:hasGeometry _:b1 . _:b1 geo:asWKT ?district2WKT FILTER ( geof:sfTouches(?district1WKT, ?district2WKT) && ( ?district1 != ?district2 ) ) } } GROUP BY ?district1name ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 1

question: Which town has the biggest population in Scotland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_town_108665504 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/population> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the longest river in Scotland?
sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?property WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:wordnet_river_109411430 ; geo:hasGeometry ?xGeo . ?xGeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT . yago:Scotland geo:hasGeometry ?yGeo . ?yGeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT FILTER geof:sfContains(?yWKT, ?xWKT) ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/length> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

question: What London underground stations are closest to the British Museum?
sparql: SELECT ?poi ?wkt WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Railway_Station ; geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?instance rdf:type osm:Museum ; osm:has_name "British Museum" ; geo:hasGeometry ?inGeom . ?inGeom geo:asWKT ?inWKT FILTER ( geof:distance(?wkt, ?inWKT, uom:metre) < 500 ) }

question: What is the distance between Liverpool and Glasgow?
sparql: SELECT (geof:distance(?livWKT, ?glasWKT, uom:metre) AS ?dist) WHERE { yago:Liverpool geo:hasGeometry ?livGeom . ?livGeom geo:asWKT ?livWKT . <http://yago-knowledge/resource/Glasgow> geo:hasGeometry ?glasGeom . ?glasGeom geo:asWKT ?glasWKT }
